name: Secrets of the Perfect Life
description:
Find the secret combination of the perfect life. Collect Money, Love, Health, and Knowledge.

Try all different combinations to see the different results. (There are 26 different endings.)

Move with "WASD" or "Arrow Keys". Make any combination you wish by collecting or ignoring items then move into the green light and see the results. In order to open doors you must collect the requirements.

This game was made for Unity Create With Code Jam 2020.

Game Arts by Gizem Uçar

Programming by Berker Uçar
